Rulings.Cat:
● Cards like “Scapegoat” and “Premature Burial” can't be activated while “Vanity’s Fiend” is on the field.
● Effects like “Cobra Jar” will still activate and start a chain, but you can't Special Summon any monster from the effect.

Rulings.Base: 1. Cards like "Scapegoat" and "Premature Burial" cannot be activated while "Vanity's Fiend" is on the field.\n2. Effects like "Cobra Jar" will still activate and start a chain, but you cannot Special Summon any monster from the effect.

PSCT.Tengu:
Ⓢ Can't be Special Summoned. 
① Neither player can attempt to Special Summon monsters.
